sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Terms = () => { return (

Terms of Service

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using CHALYATI's car rental services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

2. Service Description

CHALYATI provides car rental services through our online platform. We offer a variety of vehicles for short-term and long-term rental periods.

3. User Eligibility

You must be at least 21 years old and possess a valid driver's license to rent vehicles through our service. International drivers must have an International Driving Permit.

4. Booking and Reservations

All bookings are subject to availability. We reserve the right to modify or cancel reservations due to operational requirements or vehicle availability.

5. Rental Requirements

Renters must provide valid identification, proof of insurance, and a valid credit card for security deposits. Additional documentation may be required based on rental duration and vehicle type.

6. Vehicle Usage

Rented vehicles must be used in accordance with local traffic laws and regulations. Off-road use, racing, or other unauthorized activities are strictly prohibited.

7. Insurance and Liability

Renters are responsible for any damage to the vehicle during the rental period. We recommend purchasing additional insurance coverage for comprehensive protection.

8. Fuel Policy

Vehicles are provided with a full tank of fuel and must be returned with the same amount. Additional fuel charges may apply if the vehicle is returned with less fuel.

9. Late Returns

A grace period of 30 minutes is provided for returns. Late returns beyond this period will incur additional charges equivalent to one day's rental.

10. Cancellation Policy

Cancellations made 24 hours before the scheduled pickup time are free of charge. Late cancellations may incur a cancellation fee.

11. Prohibited Activities

Smoking, transporting pets without prior approval, and exceeding the maximum passenger capacity are strictly prohibited in our vehicles.

12. Maintenance and Breakdowns

In case of mechanical failure not caused by renter negligence, we will provide a replacement vehicle or refund the rental charges for the affected period.

13. Privacy and Data Protection

We collect and process personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our service, you consent to such processing.

14. Limitation of Liability

CHALYATI's liability is limited to the rental charges paid. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

15. Governing Law

These terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Mumbai, Maharashtra.

16. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

17. Contact Information

For questions about these terms, please contact us at legal@chalyati.com or call +91 98765 43210.

Last updated: December 2024

); }; export default Terms;
